S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4198 When using the FOR UPDATE OF clause with SUR (Scroll-insensive updatable result sets), the updateRow() method crashes
Patch derby-4198-4. This is the second part of the solution for this issue. It solves the issue of column mapping in the presence of named columns in a FOR UPDATE OF clause. The original code was not general enough; ScrollInsensitiveResultSet.updateRow needs to make use of RowChanger to do the right thing.
The patch also adds new test cases.
